title: [Wrong Price] Skin Sale not discounting Freljord Rammus
body:
According to http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-1125-1128 , Freljord Rammus is supposed to be on sale @260 RP.  I went to buy and he is listed at 520 RP.  Dragonslayer Vayne and Bear Cavalry Sejuani are both listed at 50% off, but the Rammus skin is not.  Help plz Riot!

Ok.

replies.body: It seems that it's fixed. Thanks!
its a 520 for me too... help11

Hello SlappySlap! 

Are you still having issues with this? The skin appears to be on sale for 260 RP right now.
It is currently available through the shop - you just have to go get it manually. Enjoy the skin!
